clean_data: Job Seeker Dacono CO With more than 10 years of experience in information systems I am a highly skilled Network Engineer with cross platform experience in both IT systems administration as well as team leadership and project management Routinely managing multiple high level high risk projects while maintaining switches routers and wireless networks along with network monitoring systems Including enhancements for the infrastructure such as outling operational task I have worked with several ISPs for new circuits coordinating installs pushing to maintain timelines All while
